q: As for honoring a convicted felon, Dwaine Caraway said, "I care deeply about animals" and "am deeply sorry to offend anyone who loves animals." He acknowledged Michael Vick 's past but noted that since making some bad choices, Michael Vick has devoted time to speaking to children about staying in school staying away from drugs, making positive choices about picking friends and the importance of education. That was the focus of the event. Mayor Tom Leppert said he has asked the city manager to "propose guidelines to prevent this situation in the future.
